channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Jornal de Notícias, 29 September–2 October 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 25.3–32.6%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 33.5–41.3%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 7.1–11.8%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 2.6–5.7%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 4.9–9.0%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 3.0–6.3%
  • LIVRE (Greens/EFA): 0.4–1.9%
  • Iniciativa Liberal (RE): 0.4–1.9%
  • Aliança (*): 0.8–2.8%
  • Chega (ECR): 0.8–2.8%
